reviews.review_text: Great place to hang out. Quality and quantity of food is great too. Service is up to the mark. Got to definitely try their stuffed crabs and stuffed squids. Ambience is peaceful and the owner Malito is a humble man to speak with. Overall it's worth the visit. I sure recommend to check this place out, you won't regret it.

We recently hosted a family party at Martin's Place, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience! From start to finish, everything was exceptional. The food was absolutely fantastic – each dish was flavorful, well-prepared, and beautifully presented. It was clear that a lot of care went into the menu, and every guest had something they enjoyed.

What truly stood out was the service. The staff was incredibly attentive, friendly, and efficient, making sure everything ran smoothly and that our needs were met throughout the event. They were professional yet personable, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for our large group.

I highly recommend Martin's Place for events, especially parties of around 50 people. The combination of top-notch food and excellent service makes it the perfect spot for any celebration. We’ll definitely be returning for future gatherings!

This is my favorite place in Navelim, the food is always fresh and so tasty, I find the best lepo and the portion is huge and the most delicious thing will be the stuffed crab with cheese and garlic. I definitely recommend.
